EmailTemplate.description: Send this email to inform PGs that we are planning on using an interpreter to carry out MASI call
EmailTemplate.name: 2016 - ICC Interpreter Call - Advanced Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification of language support call
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Language Support Notification
Dear {!Contact.Parent_Name__c},
We contacted you to get more information about {!Contact.FirstName}’s needs, however, we could not finish the phone call.
We will call you again in the next few days with an interpreter to translate our questions to you.
If you want to speak to us, please call 0333 150 2425 or email inclusion.support@the-challenge.org - we will be happy to help.
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Services - The Challenge
© The Challenge Network.
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239.
You are receiving this email because you opted to subscribe for communications from The Challenge Network.
